action.action-desc: Mrs. Hartzler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to clarify and expand authorization of support for chaplain-led programs for members of the Armed Forces.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Help for All Servicemembers Act.

section.header: Clarification and expansion of authorization of support for chaplain-led programs for members of the Armed Forces
section.text: Section 1789 of title 10, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking chaplain-led programs and inserting a chaplain-led program;
by striking members of the armed forces and all that follows through status and their immediate family members, and inserting a covered individual; and
by inserting , or to support the resiliency, suicide prevention, or holistic wellness of such covered individual after structure;
by striking members of the armed forces and their family members and inserting a covered individual;
by striking programs and inserting a program; and
by striking retreats and conferences and inserting a retreat or conference; and

paragraph.text: by striking subsection (c) and inserting the following:

subsection.text: In this section, the term covered individual means—

paragraph.text: a member of the armed forces on active duty;
a member of the reserve components in an active status; or
a dependent of an individual described in subparagraph (A) or (B).
